scene.name: Exam pouch organization setup
scene.description: A table with an empty exam pouch and several stationery items like pens, erasers, and a ruler

task.name: Organize exam pouch
task.description: Put all stationery items into the pouch and then take them all out
task.spoken_prompt: Task: We will practice organizing the exam pouch. First, put everything inside, and then take everything out.
task.spoken_prompt_cn: 任务描述：我们要练习整理考试袋。首先把所有东西放进去，然后再全部取出来。

subtasks.description: Pack and unpack the exam pouch
subtasks.spoken_prompt: Subtask: Please follow the steps to fill and empty the pouch.
subtasks.spoken_prompt_cn: 子任务描述：请按照步骤装入并清空考试袋。

steps.description: Put all items into the exam pouch
steps.spoken_prompt: Step one: put all the items into the exam pouch.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第一步：把所有东西放到考试袋里面。

steps.description: Take all items out of the exam pouch
steps.spoken_prompt: Step two: take all the items out of the exam pouch.
steps.spoken_prompt_cn: 第二步：把所有东西从考试袋取出来。

constraints.notes: Ensure all small items are fully contained or removed; handle stationery with care to avoid damage.
